actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 9 (1d10+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 7 (1d6+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales fire in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 13 DEX save, taking 33 (6d10) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

actions.name: Weakening Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The dragon exhales weakening gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or have disadvantage on STR-based attack rolls, STR checks, and STR saves for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The dragon can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Pounce
special_abilities.desc: If the dragon moves at least 15 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a DC 13 STR save or be knocked prone. If the target is prone, the dragon can make one Claw attack against it as a bonus action.
